name: Kaiju Crush (itch)
description:
Oh no! Giant monsters are attacking the city!

The good news, after a military accident you're just as big as the monsters. As the hero, you have the ability to talk to these monster ladies and try to reason with them. Your choices can determine if you can save the city and maybe even the world! Bond with Titania, the giantess that used to be your best friend, Pegi, the killer robot from outer space, Queen Koni, the 9th wonder of the world and the legendary monster Zira.
